# Jigsaw
A design system and component library for use in my personal projects, built using [Stencil](https://stenciljs.com/) and [Storybook](https://storybook.js.org/).

## Development

### Setup
To set up the project and install dependencies:
```bash
npm i
```

### Local Development
To develop the library locally:
```bash
npm start
```
This will start storybook and will run stencil build in watch mode. These commands can also be
run individually like so:
```bash
npm run start:storybook
npm run start:stencil
```

### Testing
To run all tests you can use:
```bash
npm run test
```

### Building
To build the library you can use:
```bash
npm run build
```
This will run a storybook build and a stencil build. These commands can also be
run individually like so:
```bash
npm run build:stencil
npm run build:storybook
```
